name: nativescript-materialdropdownlist
description: Material-Inspired Dropdown List XML widget for NativeScript Apps

scripts.debug.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns debug ios --debug-brk
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.debug.android: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns debug android --debug-brk
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-materialdropdownlist; tns plugin add ..; tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
